column4: is anyone aware of a utility to mount .vhd (virtual hard disk) in linux?
if you look around, there are some notes on how to use a very odd mount command to perform a loop mount to a file with a given offset
thanks, i ended up finding something - i can run VHDmount in CrossOver :)
if you find a clean way to mount the contents of a hdd iso, please let me know :)
